Combat
Hit Points: 157 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 12 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial; Simple Weapons
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Javelin (+7 1d6+1 R30/120); Quarterstaff (+7 1d8+1); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Tough: +40 Hit Points
Accursed Specter: May raise a slain humanoid as an obedient specter w/10 temporary HP and +2 attack until a long rest 1/long rest
Armor Of Hexes: Hexblade's Curse target has 50% chance to miss self
Eldritch Smite: May spend a spell slot to inflict +(slot level + 1)d8 HP force and knock prone w/pact weapon
Gift Of The Ever-Living Ones: Regains maximum HP from healing w/in 100' of familiar
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Hex Warrior: +1 attack and damage (Charisma instead of Strength) w/pact weapon or touched non-two-handed weapon until a long rest 1/long rest
Improved Pact Weapon: May use a bow or crossbow as a pact weapon/Pact weapon gains +1 attack and damage and can be used as a spell focus
Pact Of The Chain: Can forego one attack to allow familiar to attack as a reaction
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Searing Vengeance: May regain 78 HP, stand, and inflict R30' 2d8+2 radiant damage and blindness for 1 rd upon death saving throw 1/long rest

Aspect Of The Moon: Immune to sleep/Light activity gives benefits of sleep
Radiant Soul: Resistance to radiant damage
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 2; C1: 1; K0: 4; K5: 4 Attack: C: 7; K: 8 Spell DC: C: 15; K: 16
Spells:
Banishing Smite (K5 [The Hexblade] Abju): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +5d10 HP force, plus banishment to home plane or a demiplane for concentration up to 1 min if the attack reduces the target below 51 hit points
Blink (K3 [The Archfey] Tran): Self has a 50% chance of becoming ethereal at the end each turn, returning to a spot within 10' at the start of the next turn, for 1 min
Blur (K2 [The Hexblade] Illu): Foes suffer disadvantage when using sight to attack self for concentration up to 1 min
Branding Smite (K2 [The Hexblade] Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP radiant and lights the target for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Cone Of Cold (K5 [The Hexblade] Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (save Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cure Wounds (K1 [The Celestial] Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+2 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Daylight (K3 [The Celestial] Evoc): R60' Target centers a 60' radius bright light for 1 hr
Elemental Weapon (K3 [The Hexblade] Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 attack and +1d4 HP damage of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level gives +2 or +3 attack and +2d4 or +3d4 damage at level 5 or 7]
Find Familiar (K1 [Pact Of The Chain] Conj): R10' Self gains the service of a summoned spirit in animal form that can deliver touch attacks when within 100' [R]
Flame Strike (K5 [The Celestial] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP radiant (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP of a choice of fire or radiant]
Flaming Sphere (K2 [The Celestial] Conj): R60' 5' sphere lights a 20' radius, inflicts 2d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half), ignites unattended flammable objects, and can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Freedom Of Movement (K4 [Trickster's Escape] Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments and can escape from restraints for 1 hr
Greater Restoration (K5 [The Celestial] Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, cursed, or ability damage or regains hit point maximum
Guardian Of Faith (K4 [The Celestial] Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (save Dexterity half) for 8 hr or until 60 HP inflicted
Guiding Bolt (K1 [The Celestial] Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP radiant and gives advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Invisibility (K2 [Shroud Of Shadow] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 hr; target attacking or casting ends [+Level affects +1 target]
Lesser Restoration (K2 [The Celestial] Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Light (K0 [Bonus Cantrips (The Celestial)] Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (save Dexterity negates) for 1 hr
Phantasmal Killer (K4 [The Hexblade] Illu): R120' Target perceives a personal horror (save Wisdom negates) that frightens and inflicts 4d10 HP psychic per rd (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Revivify (K3 [The Celestial] Necr): Restores life and 1 hit point to a touched 1-minute-old corpse
Sacred Flame (K0 [Bonus Cantrips (The Celestial)] Evoc): R60' Inflicts 4d8 HP radiant (save Dexterity negates)
Shield (K1 [The Hexblade] Abju): Reaction gives +5 AC and immunity to Magic Missile until the next turn
Staggering Smite (K4 [The Hexblade] Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack within concentration up to 1 min inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, disadvantage on attacks and ability checks for 1 rd, and loss of reactions for 1 rd (save Wisdom HP only)
Wall Of Fire (K4 [The Celestial] Evoc): R120' Creates a 60'x20'x1' wall or a 20'x20'x1' ring that inflicts 5d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half) within 10' of a chosen side for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Water Breathing (K3 [Gift Of The Depths] Tran): R30' 10 targets can breathe underwater for 24 hr [R]
Wrathful Smite (K1 [The Hexblade] Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +1d6 HP psychic and frightens (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Eldritch Invocations: 8 selections
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 cleric cantrips and can cast a chosen C1 spell once per long rest
Bonus Cantrips (The Celestial): Knows Light and Sacred Flame cantrips
Celestial Resilience: Gains 22 temporary HP, and may give 5 others 12 temporary HP, at the end of a rest
Cloak Of Flies: May use a bonus action to create a 5' radius that inflicts 2 HP poison damage 1/short rest
Eldritch Master: Can recover expended spell slots once per long rest
Ghostly Gaze: May see 30' w/Darkvision through solid objects for conc up to 1 min 1/short rest
Gift Of The Depths: May cast Water Breathing 1/long rest
Grasp Of Hadar: May pull target 10' w/Eldritch Blast
Healing Light: R60' May use a bonus action to restore 21d6 HP/long rest (maximum 2d6 per healing)
Hexblade's Curse: R30' May use a bonus action to curse target; self gains +6 damage on target, crits on 19 vs. target, and regains 22 HP if target dies, for 1 min 1/short rest
Lance Of Lethargy: May inflict -10' Speed w/Eldritch Blast for 1 rd
Maddening Hex: R30' May use a bonus action to inflict 2 HP psychic damage to targets in a 5' radius around curse target
Master Of Hexes: R30' May forego regaining HP to redirect Hexblade's Curse when target dies
Mystic Arcanum: Can cast chosen K6, K7, K8, and K9 spells without using a spell slot once per long rest
Pact Magic: Can cast spells from the warlock spell list
Pact Of The Blade: Can use an action to conjure a magic weapon or use a 1 hr ritual to make a magic weapon summonable
Pact Of The Chain: Can cast Find Familiar as a ritual
Pact Of The Tome: Has a Book Of Shadows containing 3 chosen cantrips from any spell lists that can be cast at will
Radiant Soul: May inflict +2 HP radiant and fire spell damage on one target
Relentless Hex: May use a bonus action to teleport 30' to a space adjacent to curse target
Shroud Of Shadow: May cast Invisibility at will
Tomb Of Levistus: May use Reaction upon taking damage to gain 200 temporary HP and suffer vulnerability to fire and immobility for 1 rd 1/short rest
Trickster's Escape: May cast self Freedom Of Movement 1/long rest
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 10 available vs. 20 allocated
